summary: A talented pool hustler who has stayed out of the game for years, must go back to his old ways when his little brother gets involved with his enemy, the very man who held him back from greatness.
cast: Chazz Palminteri|Ricky Schroder|Rod Steiger|Michael Rosenbaum|Mars Callahan|Alison Eastwood|Phillip Glasser|Anson Mount|Glenn Plummer|Richard Portnow|Ernie Reyes Jr.|Peter Mark Richman|Christopher Walken|Mike Massey|Orien Richman|Shannon Engemann|Peter Dobson|Kristina Santoro|Michelle Ainge|Jerry North|Bojesse Christopher|Nathan Stevens|Mick E. Jones|Billy Lamb|John-Paul Salisbury|Chato|Stephen Book|Michael Aronin|Gino Dentie|Robert Scott McCloud|Dimitrius Deslis|Chris Corso|Lissa Pallo|Harry Lee|John Best|Diane D. Griffith|Jeramy Jensen|Barby Garcia|Frank Gerrish|Michael C. Jones|Scott Nankivel|Brian A. Schwartz|Gavin Sheehan|Steve Short|Charlie Terrell|Vien Voraotsady|Greg Wayne
title: Última jugada
